TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BehaviorService extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class BehaviorService Implements IDisposable
public ref class BehaviorService sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 管理設計工具中的使用者介面。

span.span: Manages user interface in the designer.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已建立，它將新增半透明視窗的設計工具的框架。When the is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame. 可以使用這個視窗來呈現使用者介面項目，稱為物件，以及所有捕捉滑鼠的訊息。The can then use this window to render user interface elements, called objects, as well as catch all mouse messages. 如此一來，可以控制設計工具的行為。In this way, the can control designer behavior. 類別支援行為堆疊，讓可推入物件。The class supports a behavior stack, onto which objects can be pushed. 當訊息透過透明的視窗中，攔截可以傳送訊息給堆疊的頂端。When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the can send the message to the at the top of the stack. 這可讓不同的使用者介面模式，根據目前的推送。This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed . 用來呈現所有物件，例如選取範圍的框線，調整大小控點和智慧標籤。The is used to render all objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags. 也會控制許多設計階段行為，例如使用對齊線，拖曳和選取。The also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[行為服務概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立您自己基礎回應使用者所按的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create your own based class that responds to user clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發它前面的事件開始拖放作業。The raises the event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 裝飾項視窗為透明的視窗位於設計工具的框架頂端。The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame. 此視窗由攔截所有的訊息。This window is used by the to intercept all messages. 它也可做為要繪製的統一畫布。It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.
